Description: Decorative ribbon in red wool ground with dark blue borders, with a brocaded design; Design in yellow and green wool and undyed linen, well-spaced large lozenges and smaller lozenges arranged in bars; Warp: S spun Z ply wool, c.12tpc; Weft: S spun wool, c.7tpc in main area, brocading in S spun Z ply green and yellow wool and undyed linen (grouped together by 3 or 4); Edges: simple selvedges or cut and fragmentary
Curator's comments: Unreg. 119; Found in drawer of unnumbered textiles in cupbaord P; Will have once been a trimming on a garment, probably a tunic; Information from Hero Granger-Taylor (7.7.1992)
